definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: Then the customs declaration may be made by consignees or their agents.
sentences.chinese: 收货人或其代理人可办理货物报关手续。

sentences.english: Less ? than Container is the mode which can be used to ship goods for more than one shippers and consignees.
sentences.chinese: 拼箱指可以为多个托运人和收货人托运货物的方式。

sentences.english: Shipper will receive a return email for confirmation on the successful VGM submission.
sentences.chinese: VGM成功提交后，收货人将收到确认回复邮件。

sentences.english: Has claim been lodged by Consignee with responsible parties?
sentences.chinese: 收货人是否向责任方申请赔偿。

sentences.english: Then we stick the new lable on the control of Commodity Inspection Bureau after cnee finish the new label.
sentences.chinese: 收货人重新做好标贴后，在商检局的监督下贴上去。

sentences.english: The consignees shall keep the rights for final inspection and claims after the goods are received.
sentences.chinese: 收货人保留到货后最终检验和索赔的权利。

sentences.english: And notify the consignees of the used mechanical and electrical products of such opinions.
sentences.chinese: 并通报进口旧机电产品的收货人。

sentences.english: Make available cargo documents to consignee or agent.
sentences.chinese: 向收货人或代理提交货运文件。

sentences.english: Please be charged to the consignee tri-n-two bills of lading.
sentences.chinese: 请向收货人收取三正两副提单。

sentences.english: The law does not impose the consignee an obligation to take delivery of the goods at the port of destination.
sentences.chinese: 法律没有加诸收货人必须提取到港货物的义务。

sentences.english: If the consignee delays in taking delivery of the goods, the consignee shall pay storage and other fees to the carrier.
sentences.chinese: 收货人逾期提货的，应当向承运人支付保管费等费用。

sentences.english: Without original HAWB , customs will not release cargo to the cnee.
sentences.chinese: 没有原始分空运单，海关将不对收货人放行货物。

sentences.english: Deliver the cleared goods to the consignee.
sentences.chinese: 将清关后的货物交付给收货人。

sentences.english: The some company countersigned to sweep bill of lading at the request of consignee.
sentences.chinese: 某公司应收货人的要求，签发了清洁提单。

sentences.english: Notify consignee or agent of arrival of shipments.
sentences.chinese: 告知收货人或代理货物到达信息。

sentences.english: Release the goods to consignee against original B/L.
sentences.chinese: 凭正本提单放货给收货人的英文怎么说？

definition: to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
